itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: The FBI raided Trump’s Florida home at Mar-a-Lago in an unprecedented move in search of classified information Trump allegedly kept after leaving the White House, and what that means for the 2022 Midterm Elections and the country at large. Plus Zachary M...
itunes:summary:
The FBI raided Trump’s Florida home at Mar-a-Lago in an unprecedented move in search of classified information Trump allegedly kept after leaving the White House, and what that means for the 2022 Midterm Elections and the country at large. Plus Zachary McClanahan aka Guantanamo Bae joins the show and Dan breaks down the recently passed Inflation Reduction Act.
